
snap(30,30,30)

sky(175,175,175)
fog(150,150,150)
ground(10000,10000,10000)

fadefrom(4000)
density(1)

name(The Frozen Freeway)

nlaps(5)

set(49,0,0,250,0)

set(47,0,0,250,0)p
set(45,0,-1200,-250,0)
set(45,0,-4000,250,0)
set(46,0,0,250,0)
set(45,0,1200,-250,180)
set(45,0,4000,250,180)
set(10,0,5000,250,0)p
